Text: YPO Member SurveyHello Everyone Im Andy Cunningham a member of the Board of Directors and Chairman of Communications for the YPO International Executive Committee Several weeks ago I sent out an email announcing our plans to conduct an important research effort among the YPO membership We would now like to invite you to share your opinions with us by participating in an online survey As a reminder we are conducting this research in an effort to better understand our current membership base and determine how best to attract this centurys premier leaders to our organization During David Martins term as Chairman of the International Board YPO will be going through an evolution to continue to be relevant in the current and tomorrows business world We believe this research is a first step towards meeting the vision of the Board To access this survey please point your browser to surveysurveyYPOasppwdxam We appreciate your participation in advance If you have any questions or concerns regarding this survey please reply to this email Andy Cunningham

YPO Member SurveyHello Everyone I wanted to drop a quick note reminding everyone to please take some time and share your opinions with us in the YPO Member survey that was recently sent to you If you started the survey but were unable to finish it we ask that you take a moment now to return and complete the survey Just click on the link within your email or copy the link information into your browser address field to complete the rest of the survey surveysurveyYPOasppwdxam If you have already completed the survey we greatly appreciate your participation If you have any questions or concerns regarding this survey please reply to this email Andy Cunningham
